author: USA TODAY, Dr. Thomas Ken Lew, Opinion contributor
title: Young doctor: I have coronavirus advice for people my age. Step back, stay healthy
description: What my generation does matters to older and medically vulnerable people, but also to us. We are susceptible to the coronavirus and can get very sick.
content:
Astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson and Ann Druyan, creator of National Geographic's "Cosmos" series, discuss the importance of science in age of COVID-19.
USA TODAY
